This is the website for your practice exercise repository. You can see an updated version of this site anytime you want by using `quarto::quarto_preview()`.

Each exercise will be listed below. Make sure to change the "status" in the exercise metadata from "Available" to "Complete" when you are done with the exercise.

Review the [instructions on the main course website](https://bldgspatialdata.github.io/website/course-exercises.html) for more information on committing your changes to each week's exercise.
